title: RIP Fiji players of OCE couldnt defend.
body: We were so close to defending Fiji. RIP

replies.body:
It seems more than coincidence that the one day we could not defend a city is the day they release a patch blocking most people from playing for 2 hours.
Two hours could have saved Fiji.
Thanks a lot Riot....
we still got 2 more cities left to defend!!!!
We won't get the final boss rewards .

None of the rewards have been locked out by failing to defend Suva.

The Mystery Champion just needs one of the two remaining cities to be defended.
The Community Wall needs all remaining cities to be defended.

The point goal was adjusted before the start of the day due to the patch falling on Thursday.

The goal was also [reduced early in the day after the patch took longer than normal, as well as some issues that happened soon after the patch. ](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/u2LH0RBV-wow-this-ocean-week-day-is-going-slow-today?comment=00020000)

There are also server issues going on at the moment.
Are we getting additional time compensation for this as well?
